snippet: Some Indians believe that the man poised to become Pakistan’s next prime minister will seek economic cooperation despite the bitter rivalry between the two neighbors.
abstract: Some Indians are optimistic that Nawaz Sharif, man poised to become Pakistan’s next prime minister, will seek economic cooperation with India despite the bitter rivalry between the two neighbors.
lead_paragraph: Some Indians believe that the man poised to become Pakistan’s next prime minister will seek economic cooperation despite the bitter rivalry between the two neighbors.

headline.seo: Pakistan Vote Inspires Measured Optimism in India
headline.main: After Vote in Pakistan, Some Hope in India
headline.print_headline: After Vote In Pakistan, Some Hope In India
